text:
silahkan ada maksud jahat, Tuhan mampu mengubahkan.
kita punya gembala.
saya tergembalakan: punya etika, perkataan. hiduplah orang yang punya etika.
tidak usah gelisah disebut kafir. tidak apa2. tidak masuk surga. di dunia sudah kacau, apalagi di surga, tidak mau saya di surga bersama yang kacau.
kita dicap apa pun itu menjadi kekuatan bagi kita. ukuran kita firman. taat pada pemimpin.
AY. 3 dalam kemegahan nama-Nya: ada suatu kemenangan.
ada lagu dalam nama Yesus! dari sini ayatnya.
kemenangan yang menenangkan jiwa.
kita bukan menang-menangan. kita punya kemenangan, dari situlah letak kemenangan kita.
Lebih dari pemenang! Hupernikomen!
mereka akan tetap tinggal, ayat 4. terbesar sampai ke ujung.
diubah,
jangan takut di mulai dari kecil beriman akan menjadi terbesar / jigdal ...
IKISST Kecil tapi beriman jadi besar
Asal tekunin, jangan cepat pindah2. Iko arus ...
PAKE BERUBAH ... salib,
saudara ingin berubah,
dilahir di tengah dunia supaya ada prubahan
2019 terkecil , 2020 terbesar.
ibadah itu harus dikatakan, dibuktikan,
kalo cuma ibadah dan tidak ada perubahan, torang nyembah siapa?
berjumpa dengan satu Pribadi!
bahwa yang satu khotbah yang dengar banyak,
bukan yang khotbah banyak yang dengar satu itu, ngimana namanya: pasar. bukan gereja. itu kekuatan Tuhan,
saudara percaya tahun depan lebih besar? Amin.
trans:
please have evil intention, God is capable to change it
we have a shepherd.
I am shepherded: have ethics, words. Live people who have ethics.
don't worry to be called infidel. It's okay. Not to enter heaven. It has been chaotic in the world, moreover in heaven, I don't want to be in heaven with the chaotic people.
whatever we are labeled will become our strength. Our size is the word. Obey the leader.
VERSE 3 in the glory of His name: there is a victory.
there is a song in Jesus name! From here is the verse.
a victory that pacifies the soul.
we are not win-win. We have victory, from there our victory is located.
More than a winner! Hupernikomen!
they will still stay, verse 4. the biggest until the end.
changed,
don't be afraid to have faith starting from child, will be the biggest / jigdal ...
IKISST Little but have faith will become big
As long as you are persistent, don't move quickly. Go with the flow ...
USE CHANGE ... cross,
you want to change,
born in the middle of the the world in order to change
2019 the smallest, 2020 the biggest.
worship must be said, proven,
if only worship and no change, whom do we worship?
meet one Person!
that one person who gives sermons, many listen,
not many who give sermons only one listens, how do you name it: market. Not church. It's God's power,
you believe next year will be bigger? Amen.
